column3: an A.M. Eatery is a very accurate name for restaurant. You definitely have to get up in the A.M. for sure in order to even get a seat in here. Off the top of my head
column4: I can count about 8 or 9 separate occasions where I have tried to come to Snooze at different times of the morning
column5: but have only ever gotten in twice because the wait times are ridiculously long and my friends and I don't want to wait for an okay breakfast.
